name: Broadmaw

skills.name: Bone Hammer
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 30% base (40% booked) chance to place 50% Dec ATK.

skills.book_value: Low: +25% damage, +10% Dec ATK chance (30%→40%). Not priority.
skills.notes: Single-hit HP-scaling A1. Dec ATK useful but low proc chance. Not main focus.

skills.name: Fell Swoop
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Places a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AoE attack. 0.2x HP multiplier per target. HP-scaling.
100% chance to place 25% Weaken on all enemies (no ACC check per Ayumilove - always lands).

skills.book_value: Medium: +20% damage, -1 cooldown (4→3). Useful for Weaken uptime.
skills.notes: AoE Weaken for team damage boost. No ACC check (always lands per Ayumilove). Useful in Faction Wars.

skills.name: Devour
skills.description: Revives a dead ally with 50% HP and 50% Turn Meter, then places a [Block Debuffs] buff on them for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Places Block Debuffs on revived ally for 2 turns. Protects from crowd control.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: -1 cooldown (6→5). Essential for faster revive cycling. Priority book.
skills.notes: Core reviver skill. 50% HP + 50% TM + Block Debuffs protection. Must book for 5-turn cooldown. Excellent for Lizardmen Faction Wars.

forms.comments: Budget Rare reviver for Lizardmen Faction Wars (8/10). Revive with Block Debuffs protection. HP-scaling. Must book A3 for 5-turn cooldown. Low priority for general content but essential for Lizardmen FW progression (user near completion).

mechanics_advisory: Budget Rare reviver for Lizardmen Faction Wars. Revive with 50% HP + 50% TM + Block Debuffs protection. HP-scaling damage (build 40000+ HP). A2 Weaken is useful team support (no ACC check per Ayumilove - always lands). MUST BOOK A3 for 5-turn cooldown for Faction Wars progression. Low priority for general content (4-5/10 Clan Boss/Dungeons) but EXCELLENT for Lizardmen Faction Wars (8/10). User Priority: Faction Wars (Priority 5) - Lizardmen near completion, Broadmaw is key reviver for final stages. Build tanky with Immortal sets, 40000+ HP, 180+ SPD, 2000+ DEF. Warmaster for HP-scaling damage. Cycle of Magic + Deterrence + Unshakeable for Faction Wars survivability and revive cycling.
